title: Mobile/fixed market share of Vodafone in its main markets 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market share.

Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) had the maximum Market share among all 2 groups, and it was for Mobile market. The minimum Market share was observed in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) for Fixed market.
Among all the Countrys, Fixed market had the highest Market share 214.0 in Country Germany and lowest value 0.0 in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group).
Country Germany and South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) had the biggest gap of 214.0 between the highest and lowest Market share found for Fixed market.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market that are presented on the X-axis.

Out of all 2 groups, Mobile market had the highest Market share in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) and Fixed market had the lowest Market share in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group).

Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) had the maximum Market share among all 2 groups, and it was for Mobile market. The minimum Market share was observed in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) for Fixed market.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market that are presented on the X-axis.

Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) had the maximum Market share among all 2 groups, and it was for Mobile market. The minimum Market share was observed in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) for Fixed market.
Among all the Countrys, Fixed market had the highest Market share 214.0 in Country Germany and lowest value 0.0 in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group).
The maximum Market share for Fixed market that was found in Country Germany was 0 times larger than the minimum Market share observed in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group).
Among all 2 groups, Mobile market had the gap of 289.0 between the maximum and minimum Market share observed in Country South Africa/Africa (Vodacom Group) and Spain respectively.
On average, the Country Germany had the highest Market share for all 2 groups Mobile market, and Fixed market. Whereas United Kingdom had the lowest average Market share.
